metadata.synopsis: Spoken by one of a  number of cambion reinforcements who storm the bridge of a nautiloid during a battle aboard the ship. Shouted battle orders to make haste. (note - this line is shared by a speaker group, though all possible speakers are male cambions - very minor characters only seen here in battle and never again).

0.speaker: Cambion, Cambion
0.text: Stop the intruders! They must not escape!
0.context: NodeContext: Urgently as the cambion joins battle with his comrades.
